net.posprinter.utils

Class DataForSendToPrinterPos80

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.posprinter.utils.DataForSendToPrinterPos80

  • public class DataForSendToPrinterPos80
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a class of instruction processing tools This type of instruction is only applicable to the products of 80mm series thermal printer pos-80xx series; please refer to the programming manual for the description and effect of specific instructions

        public static byte[] defineuserDefinedCharacters(int c1,
                                                 int c2,
                                                 byte[] b)
        Define user-defined characters
        Parameters:
        c1 - c1 is the starting character code, the range is 32<=c1<=c2<=127
        c2 - c2 is the termination character code, the range is 32<=c1<=c2<=127
        b - the format of byte array b is [x1-d1...d(x1*y)]...[xk d1...d(y*xk)], which is a collection of character data downloaded by characters
        Returns:

      • printBarcode

        public static byte[] printBarcode(int m,
                                  int n,
                                  java.lang.String content)
        Print barcode
        Parameters:
        m - Barcode type: 65-73
        n - Indicates the number of barcode data, the length of the string cannot exceed the range specified by n
        content -
        Returns:

      • printBarcode

        public static byte[] printBarcode(int alignment,
                                  int HRI,
                                  int width,
                                  int height,
                                  int type,
                                  int size,
                                  java.lang.String content)
        Print barcode
        Parameters:
        alignment - 0-2 or 48-50; respectively means: left-aligned, centered, right-aligned
        HRI - HRI text display range 0-3 or 48-51; represents the printing position of the character in the bar code
        width - Set width 2-6; default 3
        height - Set height 1-255; default 162
        type - Barcode type: 65-73
        size - Indicates the number of barcode data, the length of the string cannot exceed the range specified by n
        content - Barcode content string
        Returns:

      • returnState

        public static byte[] returnState(int n)
        Parameters:
        n -
        Returns:

      • printRasterBmp

        public static byte[] printRasterBmp(int m,
                                    android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                    BitmapToByteData.BmpType bmpType,
                                    BitmapToByteData.AlignType alignType,
                                    int pagewidth)
        Print raster bitmap
        Parameters:
        m - print type 0-2,normal is 0
        bitmap - image
        bmpType - covert bitmap to gray image by which methods
        alignType - align type 0-2,left center right
        pagewidth - print width
        Returns:
